name: v1.3.0
body:
### Changes
- Handle HTTP 5xx Status error.
- Defined each error.
- Added a new notification type ``DID_FAIL_TO_RENEW``.
- Added an ability to acknowledge purchases from playstore.

name: v1.2.1
body:
### Changes
- Changed unified receipt's status field type from string to int.

name: v1.2.0
body:
### Changes
- Added unified receipt to app store S2S notification

name: v1.1.0
body:
### Changes
- Support android publisher api v3
- Use go modules
- Added grace period fields to AppStore receipt
